name: Block 'n' Roll
description:
A short and simple puzzle game.

How to play

  • Use the mouse to click on the blocks in the balls path to make them change directions.
  • Get the rolling balls to the blue blocks to score points.
  • But don't let the ball hit another or get out of the arena. If that happens you will lose a life, and when they are all gone, it is game over!
